title: Video: Stalking Gia – Second Nature
body:
Exquisitely refined pop from NY’s **Stalking Gia** here – which now comes with a snazzy new video, featuring plenty of sultry glances down the lens.

All killer, no filler. Check it out below.

Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
